com.epoch.utils

Class DisplayRules

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epoch.utils.DisplayRules

  • public final class DisplayRules
extends Object
    Singleton class that holds the regular expressions for converting text to HTML display. Scope: loaded by the GroupLoader servlet at the time of app deployment.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static List<String[]> allDisplayRules
      Stores the rules for converting lightly formatted organic chemistry text to HTML in the order in which the rules should be applied.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private DisplayRules()
      Disables external instantiation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void addRule(String[] rule)
      Adds an array of two search-and-replace Strings, read from a file, to the list.
      static List<String[]> getAllDisplayRules()
      Gets a copy of the rules for converting lightly formatted organic chemistry text to HTML in the order in which the rules should be applied.
      static int loadRules(String file)
      Loads from a text file the rules for converting lightly formatted organic chemistry text to HTML in the order in which the rules should be applied.
      static void reset()
      Resets the list to 0 members before rereading from the text file.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • allDisplayRules

        private static List<String[]> allDisplayRules
        Stores the rules for converting lightly formatted organic chemistry text to HTML in the order in which the rules should be applied. The rules are stored as a list of arrays of Strings. In each array, the first member is a regular expression, and the second is the String which should replace it.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DisplayRules

        private DisplayRules()
        Disables external instantiation.

    • Method Detail

      • getAllDisplayRules

        public static List<String[]> getAllDisplayRules()
        Gets a copy of the rules for converting lightly formatted organic chemistry text to HTML in the order in which the rules should be applied.
        Returns:
        a list of arrays of Strings; in each array, the first member is a regular expression, and the second is the String which should replace it.

      • reset

        public static void reset()
        Resets the list to 0 members before rereading from the text file.

      • addRule

        public static void addRule(String[] rule)
        Adds an array of two search-and-replace Strings, read from a file, to the list. This method is called by servlets/GroupLoader.java each time the code is recompiled; it does not need to be called from anywhere else.
        Parameters:
        rule - an array in which the first member is a regular expression, and the second is the String which should replace it

      • loadRules

        public static int loadRules(String file)
                     throws IOException
        Loads from a text file the rules for converting lightly formatted organic chemistry text to HTML in the order in which the rules should be applied.
        Parameters:
        file - text file containing the rules; format is:
        regEx [tab] replacement
        Returns:
        the number of rules loaded
        Throws:
        IOException - if the file containing the rules can't be read
